name: Ainara Álvarez
description: Ainara Álvarezis a character inCyberpunk 2077. She isJudy Álvarez's grandmother, and can only be spoken to through phone messages. As Female V, about a day after second date inI Really Want to Stay at Your Houseplus a visit to collect Judy's gift in Judy's apartment, Judy would text to apologize for blabbing about her relationship and warned V about Ainara's interrogation skills. Described as "5'2" of pitbull", but is sweet after the initial interrogations. Her reservations revolve around V being a merc and her distrust of Corpo's with fake manners (sinceMaikafit the bill, but it's better if...
